text: Conway is a city in the US state of Arkansas. About 64,000 people live there and it is the 8th biggest city in the state. Most of its jobs are in technology, education, and retail. Its nickname is "City of Colleges" because three colleges are in it. It is home to the University of Central Arkansas and Hendrix College. ==References== Category:Cities in Arkansas Category:County seats in Arkansas
title: Conway, Arkansas
